content: Hi Shaunta — thanks for this post. It resonated with me. I started a blog a few months ago to give myself a venue to, just about, write whatever. I read a bunch to see how to build a blog people would find and read. However, most of the tips are essentially for folks who know their niche already and have a keyword strategy in place. I resisted that approach because it would hamper my creativity. I think your approach would be an interesting one to try out.
